name: Soup Factory (rthurmed)
description:
Jump and kick cans on the can factory! :D

This game was made for Paint Jam 2021. Theme: Campbell's Soup Cans by Andy Warhol.

KeysActionsLeft / Right
MoveZ / Up
JumpDown
DropX
KickP
Pause

Objective:

  • Kick the different canisters before they drop
  • You LOSE $4 every different can
  • You EARN $1 every right can
  • If you have less than $-50 you lose

This game was built with Godot game engine. Only colors from the standard MS Paint palette were used. Gimp was used for applying transparency.
